header.description: A dedicated Software Engineer. I combine clean code with responsive design to create robust applications.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hey there, I'm Farah, a curious mind who loves transforming ideas into digital experiences. I'm currently studying software engineering, and I'm always open to new opportunities to learn, collaborate, and grow.
about.paragraph2: Beyond Code, When I'm not coding, you'll find me reading, painting, or exploring new designs and project ideas.
about.quote: My goal is to create apps that are not just functional, but also beautiful and meaningful.

highschool.degree: High School Diploma in Physical Sciences

mobileDev.title: Mobile Development
mobileDev.description: Built a *cross-platform real-time school bus tracking app* connecting parents and drivers. Converted *Figma* designs into a fully functional *Flutter* application and integrated the frontend with the *Supabase* backend for real-time GPS tracking using *Mapbox*. Worked with *Agile sprints* in *Jira* and *GitLab CI/CD* to ensure efficient development and deployment. Delivered a functional *MVP* enhancing school transport safety and transparency.

projectsData.title: Attendance System
projectsData.description: Web and mobile application for student absence management with real-time tracking and advanced reporting
projectsData.fullDescription: NoSkip is a comprehensive absence management application developed with Spring Boot and React. It allows teachers to track student attendance, generate PDF/Excel reports and send automatic alerts. The application includes a native Android mobile version.

projectsData.title: Rental Car System
projectsData.description: Vehicle rental platform with complete reservation
projectsData.fullDescription: Full-stack car rental solution developed with Spring Boot and React. The system includes user authentication, vehicle management, online bookings and a comprehensive admin dashboard.

projectsData.title: Medical System
projectsData.description: Comprehensive medical management application with microservices architecture for patients, doctors and appointments
projectsData.fullDescription: Medical management system developed with microservices architecture using Spring Boot and Angular. The application manages patients, doctors, appointments, prescriptions and billing with enhanced security for sensitive medical data.

activitiesData.title: Health Event Coordinator
activitiesData.description: Organized and managed a health event at our school in partnership with medical professionals, coordinating blood donation drives, medical analyses, and health awareness workshops for students and staff.

activitiesData.title: Club Secretary - Math & Computer Science Department
activitiesData.description: Served as Secretary for our department's academic club, managing administrative operations, organizing technical workshops, and facilitating communication between students and faculty.
